COMMAND.help: IPv6 interface Neighbor Discover subcommands
COMMAND.name: ipv6 nd

PARAM.help: Set number of neighbor solicitations to send for DAD
PARAM.name: attempts

PARAM.help: Set hop limit advertised in RA and used in IPv6 data packets originated by the router
PARAM.name: hop-limit

PARAM.help: Maximum number of IPv6 router hops
PARAM.name: hop-limit-val

PARAM.help: Hosts should use DHCP for address config
PARAM.name: managed-config-flag

PARAM.help: Set IPv6 Max Router Advertisement Interval
PARAM.name: max-ra-interval

PARAM.help: Set IPv6 Min Router Advertisement Interval
PARAM.name: min-ra-interval

PARAM.help: Configure MTU advertisements in RA packets
PARAM.name: mtu

PARAM.help: IPv6 router advertisement MTU in bytes
PARAM.name: mtu-val

PARAM.help: Hosts should use DHCP for non-address config
PARAM.name: other-config-flag

PARAM.help: Set NS retransmit interval used and advertised in RA
PARAM.name: retrans-timer
